instructions:
Thaw potatoes and dry on paper towels. Then salt and pepper and set aside. Crumble and fry sausage 4
or 5 minutes over medium heat or until lightly browned. Drain grease and transfer sausage to a buttered 6 by
10-inch Pyrex baking dish. Top sausage with hash browns, beat eggs with milk, Worcestershire, mustard and
pepper and pour over potatoes. Sprinkle with Cheddar cheese and Parmesan. Bake in a 350 F oven about 35
minutes or until a knife inserted in center comes out clean. Serves 4.
ingredients: 1 3/4 cup unthawed Ore-Ida Country Style Hash Browns
name: Breakfast Quiche
